title: How do I enter recovery mode and restore my phone to its factory settings?
answer:
[When an update package is available on your microSD card or the download for an online update is complete, with the phone off, press and hold the power and volume up keys to enter recovery mode. In recovery mode, you can press the volume keys to select the desired option. Then, touch the menu key to enable a specific function. ]() 

 [To restore your phone to its factory settings, touch Settings > Backup & reset > Factory data reset.]() 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110931) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110932)
